name: Dodge (itch) (Alpha)
description:
Dodge is a fast-paced retro platformer where you frantically try to dodge the deadly enemies heading towards you. There are 9+ maps .. two of which are used in the Slime Rush mode. I'm gonna try to add more maps in the future.

This is my first ever game and I would really appreciate it if you give it a download and try it out .. its FREE and its only 34 MB. I'm gonna be releasing more games in the future.

Hope you enjoy!
